name: Chaos Squares
description:
A fun exploration of abstract and chaotic shapes that can be placed together to create unique compositions. There isn't a set pattern or layout that can be found. Great for trying to break free and see interesting shapes randomly.


Use instances to switch out the blank squares with the wide variety of abstract and chaotic shapes to create unique compositions. See the example page for how instances can link together, there isn’t a specific design pattern, if they flow together that’s purely by accident.


You can also create your frame and drag the shapes in overlapping them for even more flexibility.


I’d love to see what you create, so feel free to tag @designerbrett on Twitter with your creations.
